mapper.select: SELECT B.*, CASE TYPE WHEN 'BOARD001' THEN '자유게시판' WHEN 'BOARD002' THEN '맛집' WHEN 'BOARD003' THEN '공동구매' WHEN 'BOARD004' THEN '중고거래' WHEN 'BOARD005' THEN '부동산' WHEN 'BOARD006' THEN '구인구직' WHEN 'BOARD007' THEN '지역정보' ELSE '기타' END BOARDTYPE FROM DC_BOARD_TB B WHERE STATUS = 'BSTATUS004' AND ROWNUM <= 5 ORDER BY NO

SELECT B.*, M.NICKNAME, NVl(C.comment_count,0) comment_count, C.value boardType FROM DC_BOARD_TB B INNER JOIN DC_MEMBER_TB M ON B.MEMBERNO = M.NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) comment_count, BOARDNO FROM DC_COMMENT_TB WHERE STATUS = 'BSTATUS001' GROUP BY BOARDNO) C ON C.BOARDNO = B.NO JOIN DC_CODE_TB C ON (B.TYPE = C.id) WHERE B.STATUS = 'BSTATUS004' AND M.LOCATIONNO = #{LOCATIONNO} ORDER BY B.WRITEDATE DESC, B.NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DC_BOARD_TB B INNER JOIN DC_MEMBER_TB M ON B.MEMBERNO = M.NO WHERE B.STATUS = 'BSTATUS004' AND M.LOCATIONNO = #{LOCATIONNO}

SELECT B.*, M.NICKNAME, NVl(C.comment_count,0) comment_count FROM DC_BOARD_TB B INNER JOIN DC_MEMBER_TB M ON B.MEMBERNO = M.NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) comment_count, BOARDNO FROM DC_COMMENT_TB WHERE STATUS = 'STATUS001' GROUP BY BOARDNO) C ON C.BOARDNO = B.NO WHERE B.NO = #{bno} AND B.STATUS = 'BSTATUS004' ORDER BY B.WRITEDATE DESC, B.NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DC_BOARD_TB VALUES (SEQ_BOARD.NEXTVAL, #{title}, SYSDATE, #{content}, 0, 'BSTATUS004', 'BSTATUS001', #{memberNo}, NULL)
mapper.update: UPDATE DC_BOARD_TB SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content} WHERE NO = #{no}
UPDATE DC_BOARD_TB SET STATUS = 'BSTATUS002' WHERE NO = #{no}
mapper.select: UPDATE DC_BOARD_TB SET VIEWCOUNT = VIEWCOUNT + 1 WHERE NO = #{no}
